articles.author: HT News Desk
articles.title: Saif Ali Khan attacked: Intruder's lawyer rejects police's 'Bangladeshi' claim, says 'no proof he...' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: The police on Saturday night arrested Mohd Shariful Islam Shehzad for allegedly sneaking into Saif Ali Khan's house and stab the actor several times. | Latest News India
articles.content: The lawyer of the intruder who allegedly stabbed Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan has claimed that the Mumbai police have no evidence that proves that he is an illegal Bangladeshi immigrant. He also rej… [+2451 chars]
